title: WTB: Columbus Senators Old Judge Cards
author: shernan30

posts.post_title: WTB: Columbus Senators Old Judge Cards
posts.post_content:
Since I live in Columbus and am Ohio born and raised I'm looking for Old Judge cards of Columbus Senators players. I'm looking for cards will nice eye appeal.

Here are the players:
Mark Baldwin
Ned Bligh
Al Buckenberger MG
Edward Dailey
Henry Esterday
Hank Gastreich
William Greenwood
John Johnson
Heinie Kappell
Charles (Lefty) Marr
Albert Mays
Jim McTamany
John O'Connor
Dave Orr
James Peeples
William Widner
John Weyhing

Steven

Steve: here are the cards I have available with prices. Email me at [url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url] if interested

Jay

1. Gastreich--batting--great photo but four tack holes in margins--$175
2. Esterday--catch, hands above head--OK image--$250
3. Daley--bat on right shoulder--lighter image--$200
4. Marr--bat on left shoulder--slightly light image--$225
5. Mays--bat at ready--light angular crease across knees, otherwise nice--$275

Prices do not include actual shipping/insurance charges
